scripts.pack:darwin: electron-packager dist --prebuilt-asar dist/app.asar --extra-resource dist/api.asar --overwrite --platform darwin --icon src/img/desktop.icns --arch x64 --app-copyright="Copyright © ReactiveMarkets" --out pack
scripts.pack:linux: electron-packager dist --prebuilt-asar dist/app.asar --extra-resource dist/api.asar --overwrite --platform linux --arch x64 --app-copyright="Copyright © ReactiveMarkets" --out pack
scripts.pack:win32: electron-packager dist --prebuilt-asar dist/app.asar --extra-resource dist/api.asar --overwrite --platform win32 --icon src/img/desktop.ico --arch x64 --app-copyright="Copyright © ReactiveMarkets" --out pack
scripts.package: run-s clean copy pack installer zip
scripts.package:darwin: run-s clean copy pack:darwin installer:darwin zip:darwin
scripts.package:linux: run-s clean copy pack:linux installer:linux zip:linux
scripts.package:win32: run-s clean copy pack:win32 installer:win32 zip:win32
scripts.installer:dmg: electron-installer-dmg pack/desktop-darwin-x64/desktop.app desktop-$npm_package_version --overwrite --title Desktop --background src/img/dmg-background.png --icon src/img/desktop.icns --protocol=desktop --protocol-name "Desktop Protocol" --darwin-dark-mode-support --out pack
